author: rekovic
body:
91x PR

Switch from HLT@fake to fake2 in 2023 RelVal workflows, by changing the 
configuration of upgradeWorkflowComponents. 

This is needed since we are switching from L1TLegacy to L1TStage2 for Phase2, 
and HLT PR 91x #17796 is introducing an appropriate HLT@fake2 menu. 

To test, needs in 91x both #17796 (already merged) and #17709.
title: pr91x Update 2023 RelVal workflows with HLT@fake2
